ModMetaData.description:
零子科技-技能拓展包ZeroTech - ability expansion pack 语言Language: 简体中文Simplified Chinese 英文English
[Chinese] 人类的精神能力潜力无穷,既然如此,为何不尝试用起来改善生活
项目简介
昨日重现:使目标返回其最完美的状态!但目前仅对衣服有效 包扎:立即对一个目标身上至多5个伤口进行包扎 闪烁:跃迁到指定目标,1.5秒后返回原位置 性转:变换对方的性别,对无性别生物无效 震慑:短暂的打断对方的工作
悬梁刺股:填满休息需求 画饼充饥:填满饥饿需求 强颜欢笑:填满娱乐需求 虚幻挚爱:召唤一个爱人 堕落:使目标对所有成瘾品上瘾 充电:使指定电池的能量增加 遗忘:使目标遗忘所有的技能和特性 野火:凭空生成大量火焰,如果周围没有可燃物会很快熄灭
血源追溯:根据目标进行索引,击杀一名对方的直系女性亲属 伤害汲取:创建一条连接,在半天内将目标身上的所有伤口转移到自己身上 伤害之礼:创建一条连接,在半天内将自己身上的所有伤口转移到目标身上 尸爆:炸毁一具尸体,威力随尸体大小而变化 兽群:召唤一群不分敌我的猎杀人类的野兽 化兔:将目标变成兔子
[English] There is so much potential in human mental capacity, so why not try to use it to improve our lives
Synopsis:
Durability recovery:Repair the equipment worn by the target. Raging fire:Release flames at the target location. Rapid treatment:Wrap the target 5 times. be full:Fill the stomach. drowsy:Supplementary spirit. Hideous Laughter:Supplementary joy. charging:Charging the battery. Corpse Explosion:Choose a corpse explosion. damage absorption:Create a link to transfer all wounds on target body to the you within 12 hours (fatal injuries and disabilities cannot be transferred!) damage feedback:Create a link to transfer all wounds on your body to the target within 12 hours (fatal injuries and disabilities cannot be transferred!) decadent:Make the target addicted to all addictions. Polymorph:Turn the target into a snow rabbit. Dangerous beasts:Summon a herd of undiscriminating beasts that hunt humans and destrory after being killed. False love:Generate a false lover. bereavement:Kill the target's mother in person. amnesiac:Clear the target's trait and skill level. Gender transition:Changing the gender of the target is not effective on unisexual creatures. Interrupt:Interrupt the target's current job. Spinjitzu:Teleport to target, recover in 1.5 seconds.
[The above is from Google Translate]
